description: Template for importing an exam: define one bank object and an array of questions. Each question supports up to 6 answers; include a single isCorrect=true. Fields: bank.name (required), bank.description (optional), questions[].topic (optional), questions[].stem (required), questions[].imageUrl (optional), questions[].answers[].text (required), answers[].explanation (optional), answers[].isCorrect (boolean).

questions.stem: What is the most likely diagnosis for a patient with chest pain relieved by nitroglycerin?

answers.explanation: Typical exertional chest pain relieved by rest or nitro.
Pain usually occurs at rest and is progressive.

questions.stem: Which therapy improves mortality in COPD patients with resting hypoxemia?

answers.explanation: Shown to improve survival in chronic hypoxemia.
